page.title: 05St.John's Church
page.content: St. John's Church, Werneth has not changed since it was built in 1811. Now it is being changed into a Youth Training Centre because of all the Asian people around there, who do not go to church. The walls of the church are strong and the council thought that they could use the structure for something useful for the people around that area. I myself think that the church should not be changed. It is such a nice church, with beautiful stained glass windows and people should be proud of it.
